posts.content:
i have a very nice uk 1967 rhd camper, with pop up roof, had a referb about 9 years ago, and is always stored in the dry, i have a huge folder full of mot's and recieps for lots of things over the years
it is in lovley condition, it has mot to the end of october, it has 1600 engine with twin carbs and runs very well,
it has a warm air blower inside, which runs off of a small desiel tank in the engine bay, there are also 2 bunk beds in the roof.
in the picture the bus has a cover over the front to protect it
i will be looking for Â£17500
i may be interested in a px for a much newer camper t4/t5 and would have to have a pop up roof,



shane wallis, portsmouth,
mob 07702365583

open to offers for this bus,
ill give it a little longer before i put her on ebay

phone shane
07702365583

someone text me today about the bus, just to say
sorry i did not reply, the message was deleted before i had chance, if your intrested maybe ill hear from u agian soon,
im afraid i could not take 12k ,
its to low for a british rhd camper in this condition
thanks for the offer
shane
Hi Is this bus still for sale?

Hi

Hi I believe that it is sold.
